name: Presstacular
overview:
Presstacular by MailerMailer is a next generation email marketing tool for IT service companies that comes with fully-editable articles written by industry professionals.

The goal of Presstacular is to eliminate the time-consuming task of writing relevant articles, by providing professionally written, industry focused articles for IT service companies to help them grow their business.

The basic process is:

First, Presstacular produces fresh, engaging content that is designed to help their clients become a reliable, trusted source.

Next, an email template is created and inserted into the Presstacular customer’s account and they simply select up to three articles for their newsletter from the Presstacular article library. Customers have the option to edit the title, teaser, and content of the article as they see fit. They also have the option to create their own article if they choose to.

Lastly, Presstacular customers send their highly-targeted, engaging newsletter in effort to build and strengthen client relationships and grow their business.
